mapper.update: MERGE INTO SEARCH_KEYWORDS t USING (SELECT #{keyword} AS KEYWORD FROM dual) s ON (t.KEYWORD = s.KEYWORD) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.SEARCH_COUNT = t.SEARCH_COUNT + 1, t.LAST_SEARCH_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (KEYWORD_ID, KEYWORD, SEARCH_COUNT, LAST_SEARCH_DATE) VALUES (SEARCH_KEYWORDS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, s.KEYWORD, 1, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT KEYWORD_ID AS keywordId, KEYWORD AS keyword, SEARCH_COUNT AS searchCount, LAST_SEARCH_DATE AS lastSearchDate FROM SEARCH_KEYWORDS ORDER BY SEARCH_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}
